trends: There have been no other sightings in Topsfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details(330pmish still daylight out)well we were getting back on the highway my buddy and I heading north to NH and on a long on ramp curve was a cigar shape - plane with no wings no tail just sitting above a cloud not moving or anything the only cloud in the sky so it was hard not to see, because it was longer than the cloud, and it was silver - chrome in color and sitting above a farm of some sort mabey it was a dairy farm not sure, like two mins later it shot off heading north and left a glow streak, like a shooting star leaves and thats it in nov 97,
